column_description: The field "gml_id" is used to record the ID of the road segment
column_description_CN: 字段"gml_id"用于记录这段道路的ID

column_description: The field "Name" is used to record the name of the road segment, and road segments with different gml_id may have the same name
column_description_CN: 字段"Name"用于记录这段道路的名字，"gml_id"不同的路段名字有可能相同
